did.unittitle: Associated Students of Stanford University, Athletic Committee, records
did.abstract: These records consist of the secretary's book which contains minutes of meetings from October 15, 1894 to October 17, 1906, by-laws and amendments, record of attendance at meetings, and a report of the sub-committee on varsity sweaters and emblems; and miscellaneous items including sketches for the varsity "S", Report of Committee on Revision of the Constitution (1900), certification of shotput distance by O. E. Hyde on April 16, 1904, notes, and a clipping. Recording secretaries included Evans Holbrook, Forrest S. Fisher, Bristow Adams, and James G. Dehy.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Associated Students of Stanford University, Athletic Committee, Records (SCM0180). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: The Athletic Committee of the ASSU was organized in the fall of 1894, by-laws were adopted by the committee on October 30, 1894. The committee oversaw intercollegiate contests, management of the various sports on campus, conduct of athletes, and other aspects of athletic competition. The committee's work was assumed by the Board of Control (established by the University Trustees) in 1905.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: These records consist of the secretary's book which contains minutes of meetings from October 15, 1894 to October 17, 1906, by-laws and amendments, record of attendance at meetings, and a report of the sub-committee on varsity sweaters and emblems; and miscellaneous items including sketches for the varsity "S", Report of Committee on Revision of the Constitution (1900), certification of shotput distance by O. E. Hyde on April 16, 1904, notes, and a clipping. Recording secretaries included Evans Holbrook, Forrest S. Fisher, Bristow Adams, and James G. Dehy.
